reviews.text:
There is quite literally always 2-4 children constantly  screaming and crying hysterically while they play outside, and the staff do nothing to console them. Have seen the carers sitting on their phones while ignoring the kids play on multiple occasions.
It's not pleasant for both the neighbours who have to deal with horrendous stressful noise levels, and the kids who spend so long yelling/screaming/crying without being taken inside or calmed down.
Not sure why the staff aren't more invested or skilled with the upset kids, as the amount of crying and upset is absolutely not normal for a daycare, and I've seen staff elsewhere handle even the difficult kids much more efficiently.

Fantastic childcare centre! Belle and her entire team are so wonderful and caring. Our daughter has been going here since she was 10 months old (she's 3 now) and absolutely loves it. The educators are amazing and there is a real family feel to the care and approach of everyone.

Prahran Nido has been such an wonderful experience for my family and myself. I have two very energetic girls that the educators and the leadership team have supported with LOVE which makes my heart feel full.
The environment is safe, clean, engaging, beautiful and feels very inclusive.
Often on the drive home from Nido my little ones are telling me all the about the learning  opportunities they were provided during the day and how they love their friends, teacher and the cook.

I cannot speak highly enough of this centre.
The director Belle and all of her staff are amazing. My son has been here since he was 5months old (and he is nearly 4 now) and he loves it here. He is learning so much and enjoys playing with the other children.
The food menu is perfect! I swear Leonidas eats better than I do!
The facilities are great. Very clean! Beautiful outdoor areas and light indoor areas.
I am so happy that my son attends Nido Prahran.

Excellent communication and frequent updates on the weeks activities via their app Storytime.
Nido really values their community, values their staff, and most importantly values the children - we couldn't recommend them highly enough.
